special_text:
Whenever you cast your first spell each turn, create a token that’s a copy of Qirauz, The Prince Who Failed, except it’s not legendary, it doesn’t have this ability, and its starting loyalty is equal to that spell’s mana value.
[-1]: Draw a card. Put a loyalty counter on each legendary Qirauz planeswalker you control.
[-3]: Target permanent’s controller exiles it unless they exile two cards from their hand
[-8]: Each opponent exiles their hand, then loses 1 life for each card they own in exile.
